bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Ralph Cooper Hutchison, December 20, 1939

div1.p: Hench encloses a check for Washington and Jefferson College.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Ralph Cooper Hutchison, December 20, 1939
div1.opener:
December 20, 1939
Dr. Ralph C. Hutchison
Washington and Jefferson College
Washington, Pa.
My dear Hutch:
div1.p:
I carelessly omitted sending you the check for the
Lazear fund. Please note that I have dated it January 2.
This will help me in my income tax statements.
div1.closer:
Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
P. S. I had a nice call from a friend of your
father's--a Mr. Sills. I believe he owns the hotel in which
your father is living. He said the nicest things about your
father. I said I had only met your father once or twice.
I in turn said a few nice things about you. Everything was
“ducky”!
